title: Introduction
text: Hi [NAME], this is [YOUR_NAME] from [COMPANY]. I'm calling because we help companies like [THEIR_COMPANY] reduce their IT costs by up to 30%. Do you have 2 minutes to hear how we've helped similar businesses?
notes: General introduction script with proven results

title: Gatekeeper
text: Hi, I'm trying to reach the person who handles IT decisions at [COMPANY]. Could you point me in the right direction? I have some important information about cost savings that I think they'd want to know about.

title: Objection Handling - Too Busy
text: I completely understand you're busy. That's exactly why I'm calling - we specialize in saving busy executives time and money. Would it be better if I sent you a quick email with the key points and we could schedule a brief call next week?
notes: High-use script for common 'too busy' objection

title: Closing - Schedule Demo
text: Great! Based on what you've told me, it sounds like we could really help. The next step would be a 15-minute demo where I can show you exactly how this would work for [COMPANY]. Are you available Tuesday at 2 PM or would Thursday at 10 AM work better?
notes: Effective closing with specific time options

title: Objection Handling - Not Interested
text: I hear that a lot, and I appreciate your honesty. Many of our best clients said the same thing initially. What if I could show you in just 30 seconds how we saved [SIMILAR_COMPANY] $50,000 last year? Would that be worth 30 seconds of your time?
notes: Uses social proof to overcome initial rejection

title: Healthcare Introduction
text: Hi [NAME], this is [YOUR_NAME] from [COMPANY]. I specialize in helping healthcare organizations like [THEIR_COMPANY] improve patient data security while reducing compliance costs. Given the recent changes in HIPAA requirements, do you have 3 minutes to discuss how we're helping similar organizations stay compliant?
notes: Specialized script for healthcare industry leads
